## hline variable

Draws horizontal line from `x`<!-- -->,`y`<!-- -->, taking the current clip rect, format and style into account. The optional `s`<!-- -->, `e` (line endings) and `m` (line middle) chars can be used to override the currently active style.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hline: (canvas: Canvas, x: number, y: number, len: number, s?: string | number | undefined, e?: string | number | undefined, m?: string | number | undefined, format?: number) => void
```
